name: pm2-cluster-not-graceful-exiting
description: Showcase where pm2 cluster not graceful exiting

scripts.test:without-pm2:
echo '------ test without pm2 starts ------' && ./test.sh && echo '------ test without pm2 ends ------


'
scripts.test:pm2:
echo '------ test with pm2 starts ------' && ./test-pm2.sh && echo '------ test with pm2 ends ------


'
scripts.test:pm2-dirty-fix:
echo '------ test with pm2 dirty-fix starts ------' && ./test-pm2.sh --dirty-fix && echo '------ test with pm2 dirty-fix ends ------


'
scripts.test: npm run test:without-pm2 && npm run test:pm2-dirty-fix && npm run test:pm2

author: OpenGG <liy099@gmail.com>
